title: $:/litClock/times/-20:45-Jules Verne
quote_first: ‘It’s not impossible,’ Phileas said quietly.‘I bet you 20,000 pounds I could do it. If I leave this evening on the
quote_last: train to Dover, I can be back here at the Reform Club by 8.45 on Saturday 21 December. I’ll get my passport stamped at every place i stop to prove I’ve been around the world.'
quoteSourceTitle: Around the World in Eighty Days

title: $:/litClock/times/-20:45-Evelyn Waugh
quote_last: in a state of high self-approval; he had refused two invitations for dinner while dressing that evening; he had cashed a cheque for ten pounds at his club; he had booked a Divan table at Espinosa’s.
